extension_desc.message: Adds a toggleable sidebar with all your bookmarks at the edge of your browser window.

sidebar_search_no_results.message: No bookmarks match your search criteria

overlay_confirm_open_selected.message: Do you really want to open all {1} bookmarks, including the sub-folder bookmarks of the selected folders?

overlay_confirm_open_children.message: Do you really want to open all {1} sub-folder bookmarks?

overlay_hide_bookmark_confirm.message: Do you really want to hide this bookmark from the sidebar?

overlay_hide_dir_confirm.message: Do you really want to hide this folder from the sidebar? All sub-folder bookmarks will also be hidden.

overlay_delete_bookmark_confirm.message: Do you really want to delete this bookmark?

overlay_delete_dir_confirm.message: Do you really want to delete this folder? All sub-folder bookmarks will also be deleted.

overlay_separator_title_desc.message: You can optionally enter a title. It will be displayed on top of the separator line and can help you organising your bookmark list.

overlay_delete_selected_confirm.message: Do you really want to delete the selected entries? All sub-folder bookmarks of the selected folders will also be deleted.

overlay_check_bookmarks_no_results_chang.message: There are no changed bookmark URLs

overlay_check_bookmarks_no_results_broke.message: There are no broken bookmark URLs

overlay_check_bookmarks_no_results_dupli.message: There are no duplicate bookmark URLs

overlay_check_bookmarks_no_results_empty.message: There are no folders without bookmarks

newtab_speech_search_error.message: To enable the speech search you must allow microphone access.

newtab_fallback_headline_webstore.message: The sidebar cannot be used on the {browserName} Webstore

newtab_fallback_headline_extension_page.message: The sidebar cannot be used on extension pages

newtab_fallback_headline_new_tab.message: The sidebar cannot be used on the default new tab page

newtab_fallback_headline_system.message: The sidebar cannot be used on {browserName} system pages

newtab_fallback_headline_url_filter.message: One of your URL rules did not allow the sidebar to open

newtab_fallback_desc.message: We have opened a new tab with the sidebar for you instead.

newtab_fallback_set_as_new_tab.message: Always show this page when opening a new tab

status_feedback_unavailable_desc.message: The feedback service is currently unavailable. If you want to give feedback, please send me an email.

status_translation_unavailable_desc.message: The translation service is not available at the moment. Please try again later.

status_background_disconnected_reload_de.message: Due to an update of the extension this page needs to be reloaded.

keyboard_shortcuts_tab_desc.message: Hovers the next or previous entry in the sidebar

keyboard_shortcuts_enter_desc.message: Performs a click on the currently hovered entry

keyboard_shortcuts_shift_enter_desc.message: Opens the context menu for the currently hovered entry

keyboard_shortcuts_ctrl_c_desc.message: Copies the URL of the currently hovered entry

keyboard_shortcuts_esc_desc.message: Closes the sidebar, opened overlay or context menu

contribute_intro.message: To improve the extension I would like to know better about how users are using the sidebar and what configuration they use.

contribute_notice.message: You can help me by sharing your configuration

contribute_outro.message: If you have questions or concerns about the sharing of information then please send me a feedback message.

contribute_share_config_desc.message: You share your configuration anonymously which helps me to identify popular settings and to identify what to improve or change in future releases.

contribute_share_activity_desc1.message: You can share your activity within the sidebar anonymously which helps me to better understand how the sidebar is being used in the field. Information about your bookmarks or your visited websites [b]will not[/b] be measured.

contribute_share_activity_desc2.message: This information is very useful to identify problems in usability or features which are, for example, not being used very often.

contribute_share_activity_example_1.message: Average number of bookmarks per user?

contribute_share_activity_example_2.message: Which platform are users on (Windows, Mac, Linux, ...)?

contribute_share_activity_example_3.message: Is the search facility being used?

contribute_share_activity_example_4.message: Do users change the sorting order of the bookmarks?

contribute_share_activity_example_5.message: How often are users rearranging or editing entries?

onboarding_headline.message: Thank you for installing this extension.

onboarding_sidebar_position_desc.message: Where do you want to have your sidebar to appear?

onboarding_sidebar_open_action_desc.message: How do you want to open your sidebar?

onboarding_handson_desc.message: Now you can try out the sidebar for yourself.

onboarding_handson_mouse_desc_1.message: Move your cursor to the {1} edge of your window.

onboarding_handson_mouse_desc_2.message: Then {1} click with your mouse to open the sidebar.

onboarding_handson_icon_desc.message: Click on the extension icon at the top of your browser to open the sidebar.

onboarding_finish_notice.message: If you frequently need to click things on the {1} side of the browser window, you may want to change where the sidebar is positioned vertically when it opens to avoid opening it accidentally.

settings_restore_confirm.message: Do you really want to restore the default configuration?

settings_not_synced.message: Will not be synchronized across your devices.

settings_premium_invalid_key.message: Could not activate Premium. Please enter a valid license key

settings_expert_settings_desc.message: With the expert settings you can change all the configuration flags of the extension, even those you cannot change using the regular checkboxes or sliders on the settings page.

settings_expert_settings_notice.message: Please only change the values here if you fully understand what you are doing! Faulty configurations can cause unexpected behaviour of the extension. If something does not work properly however, you can revert to the default configuration.

settings_expert_save_error.message: Could not save settings. Please correct your input.

settings_dashboard_sidebar_options.message: Configure the behavior of your sidebar

settings_dashboard_sidebar_options_desc.message: There are various options you can change to control the extension. For example, you can change how the sidebar should slide in or how your bookmarks should be opened. If you don"t want the sidebar to be loaded on every page, you can configure this, too, using appropriate rules.

settings_dashboard_appearance_options.message: Change the appearance of your sidebar

settings_dashboard_appearance_options_de.message: You can change the look of the sidebar entirely to fit your needs. There are various options to change the font size, line spacing, colors, icons and many more. You can also pick from pre-defined designs and preset options to quickly make the sidebar look like you want.

settings_tips_tricks_quick_search_desc.message: If you open the sidebar, you can search for bookmarks by just starting to type. No need to click on the search icon in the header of the sidebar first.

settings_tips_tricks_activation_area_des.message: By default, the whole edge of your browser window can be hovered over to open the sidebar. You can make the activation area smaller by only allowing the sidebar to open at a portion of the browser height. For example, you can change the sidebar to only show up, when you click the activation area in the lower left corner of the browser window. This can be helpful to prevent the sidebar from showing up unintendedly when clicking links of the website.

settings_tips_tricks_quick_bookmarking_d.message: You can drag any URL right into the sidebar and drop it at the desired position. You can even mark and drag the current URL of a browser tab in this way. You can also drag the {1} symbol left of the address bar into the sidebar to bookmark the current page without marking the whole address bar first.

settings_tips_tricks_separators_desc.message: A bookmark entry with the URL {1} and a title {2} or {3} will be displayed as separator in the sidebar. You can add separators by right clicking any folder in the sidebar and then click on the {4} button.

settings_tips_tricks_quick_url_copy_desc.message: To copy the URL of a bookmark in the sidebar to your clipboard, you can press {1} when hovering an entry.

settings_tips_tricks_open_all_bookmarks_.message: To open all bookmarks in a folder, you can middle click on the folder. Alternatively you can press {1} while clicking on a folder with your left mouse button.

settings_tips_tricks_hide_entries_desc.message: You can hide individual bookmarks or even folders from the sidebar. You can right click on any entry in the sidebar and then click on the {1} button in the contextmenu. To display hidden entries again, you can click on the menu icon in the header of the sidebar and enable the according checkbox there.

settings_tips_tricks_expand_all_subfolde.message: To quickly open a folder with all its subfolders opened, too, you can double click on a folder in the sidebar.

settings_tips_tricks_keyboard_shortcuts_.message: The sidebar can be controlled using keyboard shortcuts. You can have a look at a list of shortcuts by clicking the menu icon in the header of the sidebar and then click on the {1} button.

settings_tips_tricks_synchronization_des.message: All your settings of the sidebar will be synchronized between your devices, if you enable the sync options of your browser in the settings. Even without Premium.

settings_tips_tricks_i18n_desc.message: The extension is available in {1} different languages. The translations are community-made and everyone can help to contribute by translating the texts of the extension in other languages. Translations will be approved and then added to the extension with the next update.

settings_tips_tricks_about_desc.message: This extension is a one man project, which started as a hobby project for personal use.

settings_tips_tricks_version_desc.message: The first version of this extension was released in November 2016.

settings_tips_tricks_right_click_desc.message: You can right click on any bookmark or folder in the sidebar to reveal additional options. For example you can edit existing bookmarks or pin entries to the top of the sidebar. When you right click a folder, you can start a bookmark check to identify broken or updated bookmark URLs.

settings_tips_tricks_share_data_desc.message: You can share your configuration anonymously which helps me to identify popular settings and to identify what to improve or change in future releases. The extension is not collecting any personal data or reading bookmarks. Without explicit permission, the extension is also not sharing any configuration.

settings_tips_tricks_multiselect_desc.message: You can select multiple bookmarks or folders in the sidebar to open, delete or even move them with drag & drop at once.

settings_tips_tricks_newtab_desc.message: You can configure the appearance of the New Tab Page directly on the page by clicking the {1} button in the lower corner. Then you can change the grid items, search engine, background image or the links on the top.

settings_tips_tricks_privacy_desc.message: The bookmarks displayed in your sidebar are synchronized and managed by {browserName}. The extension does not store or analyse these bookmarks, and only displays the ones of your browser in the sidebar.

settings_open_action_desc.message: Open the sidebar by clicking or moving the mouse pointer over the left or right edge of the browser window. Alternatively you can change it to only open if the extension icon is clicked.

settings_toggle_area_desc.message: By default, the whole edge of your browser window can be hovered over to open the sidebar. You can change this and also configure exactly where to open the sidebar.

settings_toggle_area_height_desc.message: You can reduce the height of the active area so the sidebar will only open when you move your cursor into that area at the edge of your browser window.

settings_link_action_desc.message: Left click a bookmark will open them either in the current tab or in a new tab.

settings_open_delay_desc.message: Prevents the sidebar from opening immediately when hovering or clicking on the activation area at the edge of the browser window.

settings_prevent_pagescroll_desc.message: Prevents scrolling of the current website while the sidebar is open.

settings_dir_accordion_desc.message: Closes all folder except the currently active one.

settings_remember_state_open_states_and_.message: Scroll position and currently opened folders

settings_remember_state_all.message: Scroll position, currently opened folders and last opened bookmark

settings_remember_desc.message: Select what to remember across page changes. If you choose to remember the last opened bookmark, it will be marked when opening the sidebar again.

settings_new_tab_desc.message: Open bookmarks in new tab in the foreground or the background

settings_new_tab_position_desc.message: Open new tabs after the last or the current tab

settings_close_timeout_desc.message: Timeout in seconds after the sidebar will be closed. Time will start as soon the mouse leaves the sidebar and stops when hovering over it again.

settings_scroll_bar_hide_desc.message: Timeout in seconds after the scrollbar will be hidden. Scrolling will show the scrollbar again.

settings_reopen_sidebar_desc.message: Automatically open the sidebar again, after opening a bookmark from within the sidebar.

settings_prevent_windowed_desc.message: Disables the ability to open the sidebar by clicking on or hovering over the edge of the browser when the browser is in window mode.

settings_tooltip_delay_desc.message: Delay before the tooltips for the bookmarks will be displayed when hovering with the mouse.

settings_tooltip_desc.message: Select what information the tooltip should contain.

settings_sidebar_position_desc.message: Define whether the sidebar should open on the left or right side of the browser window.

settings_filter_intro.message: If you don't want the sidebar to be loaded on every page, you can configure where to load the extension (whitelist) or where not to load it (blacklist).

settings_filter_explanation_1.message: Only add one URL pattern per line

settings_filter_explanation_2.message: Use * to match any character (e.g. example.com/* matches all pages under example.com)

settings_filter_explanation_3.message: If you don't include any * in a rule, only exact URL's will match (e.g. "example.com/about.html" won't be matched for the URL "example.com")

settings_filter_explanation_4.message: You don't need to add the protocol (e.g. http://) in the rules

settings_filter_visibility_blacklist.message: On every page except specified pages

settings_import_export_notice.message: The extension settings are synchronized automatically between your devices, if you are logged in to {browserName} with your account. If you don't want to login or want to share your settings with other people or devices you can use this import/export options.

settings_import_export_desc.message: You can export your extension settings and save them locally on your computer. You can import the previously exported file on any device where the extension is installed.

settings_import_failed.message: Failed to import the configuration. Please choose a valid file.

settings_import_export_bookmarks_desc.message: This is a browser feature and not part of the extension. Read more about how to import and export bookmarks in {browserName}.

settings_presets_desc.message: You can select predefined sizes for the sidebar. This will change the sliders on this page which will adjust the sidebar width, line heights, icon sizes and many other visual options.

settings_color_scheme_desc.message: The color of the sidebar header, checkboxes, etc.

settings_font_family_desc.message: The typeface of the sidebar and the overlays

settings_icon_color_desc_1.message: The icon color will be set automatically to match color scheme of your system (light or dark). You can also define your own custom color for the icon.

settings_icon_color_desc_2.message: Please note that the automatic color will not work when using a custom {browserName} theme.

settings_custom_css_desc.message: You can define your own stylesheet to override the default styling. Please only use this option if you are familiar with CSS and fully understand how to use them.

settings_themes_notice.message: You can choose the basic design of the sidebar. The selected theme can be customized with the available sliders and color options.

settings_theme_default_desc.message: This theme lets you access your bookmarks in a clean, modern way. The color of many of the elements can be changed by modifying the color scheme.

settings_theme_glass_desc.message: This theme makes the background of the sidebar semi-transparent and adds a blurry glass effect to it. You can adjust this effect and the transparency of the sidebar.

settings_theme_focus_desc.message: This theme reduces the animations and arranges the elements more dense for improved productivity and performance.

settings_newtab_desc.message: Chromium based browsers do not allow loading extensions on the default new tab page. Because of this the sidebar feature will not work there. To circumvent this problem options have been added allowing you to access your bookmarks when opening a new tab.

settings_newtab_override_desc.message: Should the extension override your current new tab page with either 1) a custom made page or 2) a website page which should be loaded when opening a new tab?

settings_newtab_sidebar_auto_open_desc.message: Configure whether the sidebar should be opened automatically when opening a new tab.

settings_newtab_focus_omnibox_desc.message: If enabled, the address bar will be focused when opening a new tab. If not enabled, the search box of the website will be focused instead.

settings_newtab_website_desc.message: Instead of opening the new tab replacement, you can specify an alternative website page to load.

settings_language_desc.message: The language of the user interface

settings_translation_desc.message: You can help translating the extension into your language or improve the existing one.

settings_translation_info.message: You can edit existing translations or add missing ones. If you submit your changes I will review your input and approve it.

settings_translation_notice1.message: When all categories which are marked as "Required" are translated the translation will be released.

settings_translation_notice2.message: Incomplete categories will not be released to prevent partially translated texts.

settings_translation_help.message: For each entry you can see the English translation which needs to be translated in your language. To help you to identify where the text is used, and what it is for, each entry has a name (e.g. {1}), which should not be translated. Please don't forget to submit your translation by pressing the "Submit" button at the top of the page.

settings_translation_reminder_desc.message: I want to be notified when new language variables are being added to the extension

settings_translation_submit_message.message: Your translation has been submitted successfully

settings_translation_status_incomplete.message: Translation is available but some categories are incomplete

settings_translation_status_draft.message: Translation is incomplete or needs a review and is not available to users

settings_support_feedback_desc.message: Have any suggestions for improvements, questions, noticed missing configuration options, or found a bug? To help improve this extension I would be very grateful for any and all feedback you can give me.

settings_support_feedback_notice.message: Please compose your feedback in English language. Otherwise it will be difficult for me to understand and answer your message.

settings_support_feedback_screenshot_err.message: The file size of {1} is too big (> 1 MB)
You can only upload a maximum of {1} screenshots

settings_support_feedback_send_failed.message: Your message could not be sent. Please try again.

settings_permissions_desc.message: In order to make a togglable sidebar possible in {browserName}, the following permissions are required and requested by the extension:

settings_permissions_contentscript_desc_.message: Unfortunately {browserName} has no mechanism to display content in the browser window without interacting with the current webpage.
Because the sidebar is being displayed on top of the current web page this permission is required. The permission is not used for any other purpose.
If you have concerns regarding what I'm doing with these permissions you can view the source code of the extension on Github. It's Open Source and is visible for everyone.to view.

settings_permissions_bookmarks_desc.message: The extension is displaying your bookmarks in the sidebar and therefore needs this permission to gain access. The permission also allows the extension to add, edit and remove bookmarks.

settings_saved_share_userdata.message: Your preference has been saved successfully

premium_popup_text.message: Have you checked out Premium yet?

premium_restricted_text.message: This feature is only available with Premium

premium_desc_1.message: With Premium you will get access to additional features and help me maintaining the extension.

premium_desc_2.message: You can check out the features included in Premium below. All key features of the extensions are free to use and won't require Premium access. You can pay what you think the extension and my work is worth to you to gain access to these features.

premium_show_license_input.message: I already have a Premium license key

premium_feature_early_access_headline.message: Be first to try out new experimental features

premium_feature_early_access_desc.message: With Premium you get access to unreleased features, which are currently under development or undergoing testing.

premium_feature_sidebar_width_headline.message: Change the width of your sidebar at any time

premium_feature_custom_background_desc.message: If you are using the New Tab page of this extension you can set your own background image to make it look even nicer.

premium_feature_custom_css_headline.message: Customize everything with your own Stylesheet

premium_feature_custom_css_desc.message: If you are familiar with CSS, you can change the complete appearance of the sidebar by adding your own style definitions. This allows you to customize absolutely anything.

premium_feature_linkchecker_headline.message: Check your bookmarks for broken links or duplicates

premium_feature_linkchecker_desc.message: You can right-click any folder in your sidebar and perform a check. The result page will show all updated URLs, bookmarks which are no longer working and bookmarks with the same URL.

premium_feature_themes_headline.message: Change the theme of your sidebar

premium_feature_themes_desc.message: You can swap the whole design of the sidebar with one click by installing another theme. They can also be customized with the available sliders and color options.

premium_pay_intro_payment_method.message: Select a payment method below and choose the desired amount you want to pay in the next step.

premium_pay_wechat_desc.message: Scan this QR code on WeChat to proceed.

premium_pay_contact.message: If you are encountering any issues with your payment or have any questions, please contact me at {1}.

premium_pay_price_info.message: This is a one-time charge and includes all future Premium features as well.

premium_pay_price_pay_what_you_want.message: You can pay what you think the extension and my work is worth to you to gain access to the premium features. You will always receive all premium features, regardless of how much you are willing to pay.

premium_pay_eula_desc.message: I read and accept the [a]End-User License Agreement[/a]

premium_pay_success_info.message: {1} has been activated automatically for this device. You don't need to do anything else.

premium_pay_license_key_desc.message: If you want to activate {1} on another device or after reinstalling the extension, you can enter the following key in the Premium settings in the extension:

premium_pay_info_email_desc.message: Please enter your mail address to receive the license key.
